triples.name: Reinforcement learning
triples.relevance: Foundational ML paradigm for sequential decision-making that the paper builds upon and reviews.

triples.name: Deep learning
triples.relevance: Technique that enables RL methods to handle high-dimensional environments, core to the paper's focus.

triples.name: Deep reinforcement learning
triples.relevance: The primary technique reviewed; combines deep learning with RL for sophisticated agent control.

triples.name: Multi-agent system
triples.relevance: Core domain of the paper; systems where multiple agents must communicate and cooperate.

triples.name: Transfer learning
triples.relevance: Technique reviewed in the context of multiagent learning for knowledge transfer across agents.

triples.name: Partially observable Markov decision process
triples.relevance: Framework for handling partial observability challenges in multiagent environments.
